Record.ClassificationPath: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Pregnancy Complications/Pregnancy Complications, Cardiovascular
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: The co-occurrence of pregnancy and a cardiovascular disease. The disease may precede or follow FERTILIZATION and it may or may not have a deleterious effect on the pregnant woman or FETUS.
